title: Update user password/pin
name: UpdatePassword
description: Update password of a given user.

title: Configure Subscriber Subscription
name: ConfigureSubscription
description: Configure subscription of a subscriber. Use config values enable or disable.

title: Delete Subscriber
name: Delete
description: Delete a subscriber with the given id

title: Get subscribers collection
name: FetchAll
description: Get a collection of subscribers

title: Get Subscriber
name: Get
description: Get a subscriber with the given id

title: Login a subscriber
name: Login
description: Log in a subscriber. The request returns a token used to authentication of the subscriber on subsequent requests. The token is placed as an HTTP header ie Authorization: Bearer <Token-here> otherwise requests are rejected.

title: Logout a subscriber
name: Logout
description: Invalidate a subscribers token

title: Create a subscriber
name: Signup
description: Create a new subscriber. This Content should be submitted as multipart/form-data.

examples.title: Request Example, should be submitted as```multipart/form-data```.

title: Update Subscriber
name: Update
description: Update a subscriber with the given id

title: Update subscribers logos
name: UpdateLogo
description: Update a logo of a given subscriber. This should be submitted as multipart/form-data data format.

title: Update subscribers password
name: UpdatePassword
description: Update password of a given subscriber.

title: Update subscribers subscription plans
name: UpdateSubscriptionPlan
description: Update subscription of a given subscriber

title: Verify a user/subscriber
name: Verify
description: Verify a user/subscriber

title: Delete User
name: Delete
description: Delete a user with the given id

title: Get users collection
name: FetchAll
description: Get a collection of users

title: Get user's address collection
name: FetchUserAddresses
description: Get a collection of user's addresses

examples.title: Response Example:
examples.content:
[{
  "_id" : "556e1174a8952c9521286a60",
  user: "556e1174a8952c9521286a60",
  short_virtual_code: "MP7H+E2",
  long_virtual_code: "6EAEMMP7H+E2",
  location_pic: "/media/a8952c9521286a60.jpeg",
  latitude: 4.567889,
  longitude: -12.098,
  street_address: "",
  city: "nairobi",
  country: "kenya"
}]

title: Login a user
name: Login
description: Log in a user. The request returns a token used to authentication of the user on subsequent requests. The token is placed as an HTTP header ie Authorization: Bearer <Token-here> otherwise requests are rejected.

description: Invalidate a users token

title: Create a user

description: Create a new user

title: Create Address
name: CreateNew
description: Create an Address. Data should be submitted as multipart/form-data.

Parameter.description: id of the user creating the address

examples.title: Request Example
examples.content:
(this is not json data but listing of request fields, all fields should be placed
as part of the multipart/form-data data):
{
     "user" : "556e1174a8952c9521286a60",
     location_pic: "image file"
     short_virtual_code: "MP7H+E2",
     long_virtual_code: "6E9AEFMP7H+E2FH",
     latitude: 4.567889,
     longitude: -12.098,
     street_address: "",
     city: "nairobi",
     country: "kenya"
}

examples.title: Response Example:
examples.content:
{
  "_id" : "556e1174a8952c9521286a60",
  user: "556e1174a8952c9521286a60",
  short_virtual_code: "MP7H+E2",
  long_virtual_code: "6E9AEFMP7H+E2FH",

  latitude: 4.567889,
